title: Twisted Tales (6U75)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a [Isengard] Man, you may spot a possession to stack that possession here.
Lore:	”'Too long have you sat in the shadows….'”
Rarity:	U
